TopicTitle: Sort parts option to be persistent

Articles.Content:
Each time you return to the VAB/SPH the game forgets your chosen sort order for parts. 

I always want the parts sorted by Mass, it happens to be my no.1 criteria when selecting parts, so it's a pain having to select Mass again every time I return to the VAB/SPH. 

I would have thought it was a fairly trivial thing to make the game remember this selection between visits to the VAB/SPH and when restarting the game. 

Edited April 7, 2016 by Foxster

+1 

Would be nice to have if it's not a major pain for the devs
